reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 95/09: APPLICATION OF CORPORATIONS INFORMATION ACT

content.content: 1. The Corporations Information Act applies to a community care access corporation. O. Reg. 95/09, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The Corporations Information Act applies to a community care access corporation. O. Reg. 95/09, s. 1.

content.content: 2. In the case of a community care access corporation that exists under the Act on the day this Regulation comes into force, the requirement in subsection 2 (2) of the Corporations Information Act shall be read as a requirement to file an initial return within 60 days after that day. O. Reg. 95/09, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. In the case of a community care access corporation that exists under the Act on the day this Regulation comes into force, the requirement in subsection 2 (2) of the Corporations Information Act shall be read as a requirement to file an initial return within 60 days after that day. O. Reg. 95/09, s. 2.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 95/09, s. 3. Français  Français
content.raw_html:
3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 95/09, s. 3.
